Vivian Wong

Hi! I am a graduate student at Stanford University studying Civil Engineering. My interests are in solving critical societal and urban problems with the help of computational methods such as digital simulation and AI.

Recently, I interned at Alibaba Cloud, where I worked under the City Brain Project to develop intelligent traffic signal control algorithms.
